description: This Java file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, providing basic endpoints for a backend application such as welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info endpoints.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller in a Spring Boot application providing endpoints for greeting, documentation redirection, health status, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message when the root endpoint is accessed.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to Swagger UI for API documentation, preserving request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string with basic application information.
